name: The Grand Escape (michalvankodev)
description:
The Grand Escape is a game where you need to steer your boat to avoid obstacles and avoid enemy bullets. The difficulty will be increased after a certain time and new enemies will be spawned to make your escape harder. However, there is no end to your adventure so try to earn as many points as possible!

The side-effect is implemented in a hidden way, but if you manage to stay alive for a longer time, you will definitely notice it.

All assets and work have been done by me and my friend Dantys. Sounds including!

This was the most fun I had programming in 15 years. Thank you very much everyone for organizing and playing.

Big shout out to NiklasEi for his template and kira audio plugin!

Credits:

You can check my blog on: https//michalvanko.dev.

Follow Dantys on instagram

Follow me on Instagram, twitter, GitHub, YouTube

Almost all of the work was also broadcasted on my twitch channel! Please consider following for much more content.

ENJOY!!!
